formattedAddress: 172 Canal St, New York, NY 10013, USA
adrFormatAddress: 172 Canal St, New York, NY 10013-4502, USA

originalText.text: This is the only place I buy my jewelry! Ellen is welcoming, sweet, lovely and professional! She always help me find the best design and quality, very helpful if I need repair or resizing, she gives great prices too! Highly recommended!

text.text: This is the only place I buy my jewelry! Ellen is welcoming, sweet, lovely and professional! She always help me find the best design and quality, very helpful if I need repair or resizing, she gives great prices too! Highly recommended!

originalText.text:
Me and my fiance came to this store to buy wedding bands and it was a great experience!  Ellen was one of the cowowners who helped us.

She looked at my fiance's engagement ring and accurately picked out a wedding band that would compliment it.  My fiancé and  I were in agreement that it was a wonderful pick.  I was originally going to get a plain band, but Ellen quickly picked me ring that caught my interest that was minimal stlye with elegance.  We bought the rings and ended up browsing and buying some other things as well.  Their selection is quite varied.  Ellen is a fantastic jewelry designer with great taste!

We're very happy with our time spent at the shop!  Thanks Ellen for making the experience enjoyable!

originalText.text: Jason the co-owner is a sincere and honest person.  He will treat you like a friend instead of a one time shopper.

text.text: Jason the co-owner is a sincere and honest person.  He will treat you like a friend instead of a one time shopper.

originalText.text: When I was going to propose to my wife my friend referred me to Ellen at Something Special to look for a ring. He purchased his wife’s ring there and had referred a couple of other friends to her as well. Ellen helped me pick the perfect ring for my wife and delivered it within a week! My wife loved her ring so much that we went went back to purchase our bands from her. Thank you again, Ellen!

originalText.text: Bought an engagement ring for my girlfriend. Super happy with the price and quality. Thank you Ellen!
